en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks for your full legal name as it appears on official documents.
en.answer_guidance: State your full legal name (first, middle, last). If different on documents, clarify as asked.

ko.title: 설명
ko.intent: q_id가 없을 때 인덱스로 매핑하는 샘플 해설입니다.
ko.answer_guidance: 필요 시 간단한 맥락과 함께 예/아니오로 답변하세요.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks if you have used any other names (aliases, maiden name, previous legal names).
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if you have used any other names and list them; otherwise No.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Requests your date of birth to confirm identity and eligibility.
en.answer_guidance: State your full date of birth (MM/DD/YYYY) as on your official documents.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks for your current residential address for correspondence and jurisdiction.
en.answer_guidance: Provide your current physical address. If recently moved, be consistent with your application.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Verifies 5-year residence history continuity at your current address.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes only if you lived there continuously for the last 5 years; otherwise No and be ready to list prior addresses.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Checks trips outside the U.S. in the last 5 years for continuous residence and physical presence analysis.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if you took any trips abroad; be ready to provide dates, length, and destinations.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Determines if any single trip lasted more than 6 months, which may disrupt continuous residence.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if any single trip exceeded 6 months; otherwise No. Provide documentation if applicable.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks your current marital status for eligibility and documentation requirements.
en.answer_guidance: State your status (single/married/divorced/widowed/separated) consistent with legal records.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: If your spouse is a U.S. citizen may affect eligibility pathways and documentation.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes only if spouse is a U.S. citizen; be prepared to show proof (e.g., passport, naturalization certificate).

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks whether you have children to confirm dependents and disclosure completeness.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if you have any children (biological, adopted, step). Provide number and details if asked.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Ensures all children are listed on your application as required.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if every child is listed. If any are missing, update your application and answer accordingly.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Requests your current employment to verify work history and good moral character.
en.answer_guidance: State your current job title and employer. If unemployed, state ‘unemployed’ and, if asked, since when.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks about extended unemployment which may prompt questions about support and tax filings.
en.answer_guidance: Answer truthfully. Provide dates and context if you had a long unemployment period.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Assesses criminal history not resulting in arrest; honesty is required.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if you committed any crimes/offenses even without arrest; consult records and provide explanations.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Checks any arrest/citation/detention by law enforcement for background review.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if any arrest, citation (including some traffic), or detention occurred; provide dates and outcomes.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Confirms criminal convictions which are critical to eligibility and GMC (good moral character).
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if convicted by a court. Bring certified court dispositions.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks about suspended sentences, probation, or parole indicating post-conviction supervision.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if you received any suspended sentence, probation, or parole; provide documentation.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Determines if you were incarcerated which affects GMC analysis.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if you have been in jail or prison at any time; provide dates and locations.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks about fraud or misrepresentation to obtain immigration benefits; this is serious.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if it ever happened and be prepared to provide full details; consider seeking legal advice.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Checks if you owe overdue taxes at any level of government.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if any taxes are overdue; bring evidence of payment plans or resolutions.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Verifies any prior U.S. military service for background and selective service issues.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if you served in the U.S. military; provide service dates, branch, and documents (DD-214).

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks if you refused to support the military or to bear arms, relevant to oath and exemptions.
en.answer_guidance: Answer truthfully and explain context (e.g., religious objection) if applicable.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks about Selective Service registration for eligible males (generally ages 18–26).
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if registered. If required but not registered, prepare an explanation and evidence.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Checks affiliations with organizations, associations, or groups for security and GMC review.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if you were a member/associated with any; list significant affiliations if asked.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks about involvement with the Communist Party or totalitarian parties for inadmissibility concerns.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if applicable and be ready to provide timelines and context.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Screens for any association with terrorist organizations (national security).
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if applicable and provide details; false answers can have severe consequences.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks if you were ordered removed/excluded/deported from the U.S., affecting eligibility.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if any such order exists; bring all immigration court documents.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Checks if you helped anyone enter the U.S. illegally (alien smuggling).
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if it occurred; provide full context and seek legal advice if needed.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Confirms your support for the U.S. Constitution and government as part of the Oath of Allegiance.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if you support them. Be prepared to affirm this during the oath.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks if you are willing to take the full Oath of Allegiance, a requirement for naturalization.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if you intend to naturalize and accept all obligations of the oath.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks if you are willing to bear arms if required by law (with possible religious exceptions).
en.answer_guidance: Answer according to your beliefs and legal requirements; conscientious objectors may explain.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks if you will perform noncombatant service if required by law.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if you are willing to serve in a noncombatant role if required.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks if you will perform work of national importance under civilian direction if required by law.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if you are willing to perform such work when required.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks if you have persecuted anyone due to protected grounds (race, religion, etc.).
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if it occurred and be prepared to provide details; this is a serious bar to eligibility.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Screens for participation in genocide, a ground of ineligibility.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if applicable; expect detailed questioning and legal implications.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks about acts of torture, a ground of ineligibility and serious human rights violation.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if applicable; provide details and seek legal counsel.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks whether you received military or weapons training (security screening).
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if you received such training; provide context (e.g., compulsory service).

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks if you failed to file required tax returns, which may affect GMC.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if you failed to file; bring proof of subsequent filings and resolutions.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks if you claimed to be a non-U.S. resident on tax returns after becoming a lawful permanent resident.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if you did; bring explanations and amended returns if applicable.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks if you misrepresented facts to obtain U.S. public benefits, a serious issue for eligibility.
en.answer_guidance: Answer Yes if applicable and be prepared to provide full details; consider legal advice.

en.title: Explanation
en.intent: Asks for your full legal name as it appears on official documents.
en.answer_guidance: State your full legal name (first, middle, last). If different on documents, clarify as asked.

ko.title: 설명
ko.intent: 공식 문서에 기재된 전체 법적 이름을 묻습니다.
ko.answer_guidance: 이름(First), 가운데 이름(Middle, 있으면), 성(Last)을 포함한 전체 이름을 말하세요. 문서의 표기와 다르면 요청에 따라 설명하세요.
